name: PhilipsAirPurifier

”Alexa, turn bedroom on”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: air purifier
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Clean the air with Philips Air Purifiers skill for Amazon Alexa. 
The connected Philips Air Purifiers are compatible with Amazon Alexa; you can control the Philips Air Purifier and monitor your indoor air quality with the Philips Air Purifier skill for Amazon Alexa. 

To get started, click "Enable" above and sign in with your Philips account credentials to link your Philips Air Purifier to Amazon Alexa. You must have created a Philips. account and set-up your Philips Air Purifier in the Air Matters app (Air Matters Network Pty Ltd) or the Air+ app (Philips Domestic Appliances). 

Ask Amazon Alexa to start or stop the Philips Air Purifier or ask what the air quality is by saying: 
"Alexa, turn <bedroom> on" 
"Alexa, turn <bedroom> off" 
"Alexa, set <living room> to sleep"
"Alexa, switch <kitchen purifier> to turbo"
"Alexa, set <bedroom> to allergen"
"Alexa, set <bedroom> to general"
"Alexa, what is the air quality in the <living room>" 

Philips Connected Air Purifier series: 
600: AC0650
800: AC0850
1000: AC1214/10, AC1214/4X, AC1214/50, AC1214/60, AC1715
2000: AC2889/10, AC2889/40, AC2889/50, AC2889/60, AC2889/90, AC2936/13, AC2936/33, AC2939/10, AC2939/70, AC2958/23, AC2958/53, AC2958/63, AC2959/63, AC2959/53
3000: AC3259/10, AC3259/50, AC3259/60, AC3033/10, AC3033/30, AC3033/73, AC3033/83, AC3036/10, AC3039/10, AC3039/73, AC3055/50, AC3059/65, AC3059/50
4000: AC4550/10, AC4550/50, AC4558/10, AC4558/50, AC3854/25, AC3854/50, AC3858/50, AC4236/10
5000: AC5659/10, AC5659/30, AC5659/40, AC5659/50
6000: AC6679/20
8000: AMF765, AMF865, AMF870

2-in-1 Purifier and Humidifier Series:
2000: AC2729/10, AC2729/11, AC2729/50, AC2729/51, AC2729/90
3000: AC3829/10, AC3829/50, AC3829/60

For additional support on how to connect your Philips Domestic Appliances device to Amazon Alexa, visit www.philips.com/support. 

This skill supports up to three devices.

More information about air quality is available at www.air-matters.com. 

You can find more information on the way we process your data through the Developer Privacy Policy link below.
